HostBlizzard is a privately owned Canadian web hosting company dedicated to providing reliable, affordable and quality shared hosting, reseller hosting and VPS hosting services to customers all over the world. Our mission has been to provide superior service, fast and friendly support and affordable web hosting solutions to individuals and businesses alike.

All HostBlizzard services are backed by our technical support; 100% available, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and 365 days a year.

Q: What form of payments do you accept?
